entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add ExternalAccess project to give DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader to dotnet format #68304
  • Automatic formatting inconsistent when pressing Enter within braces #68303
  • 'CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled #68301

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unexercised C# binaires from VB OptProf test profiling #68302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge RecoverableText and WeaklyCachedRecoverableValueSource into one type #68295
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix offered options for 'use primary constructor' #68296
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make ConstantTextAndVersionSource no longer a ValueSource. #68298
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
